amenities.description: Covered dining space with tables, chairs, and overhead shade structure

amenities.name: Yoga / Meditation Deck
amenities.description: Open-air covered deck for yoga, stretching, and meditation with mats and props

amenities.name: Basketball Half-Court
amenities.description: Half-court basketball with regulation hoop, outdoor surface, and perimeter fencing

amenities.description: Sand volleyball court with net, boundary lines, and sand fill

amenities.name: Tennis Court

amenities.name: Children's Playground
amenities.description: Safe play area with swings, slides, climbing structures, and rubber safety surfacing

amenities.name: Coworking / Business Center
amenities.description: Air-conditioned workspace with desks, WiFi, power outlets, and printer

amenities.name: Game Room
amenities.description: Indoor recreation room with pool table (billiards), foosball, ping pong, and board games

amenities.name: Fire Pit / Bonfire Area
amenities.description: Outdoor fire pit with surrounding seating, perfect for evening gatherings

amenities.name: Outdoor Movie / Projection Area

amenities.name: Tropical Gardens / Green Spaces

amenities.name: Restrooms / Changing Rooms

amenities.name: Security / Surveillance System
